ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SE_Contact', OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), NOT(REGEX(Phone, "^([+]47|[+]46)[0-9]{7,9}$")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "^([+]47|[+]46)[0-9]{7,9}$")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)), NOT(REGEX(OtherPhone, "^([+]47|[+]46)[0-9]{7,9}$")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone numbers must start with +46 or +47 followed by 7-9 digits.
